name: psitransfer
tagline: A simple self-hosted service for temporary file sharing
description: PsiTransfer is a self-hosted simple file sharing solution for temporary uploads with expiration. It features drag-and-drop support, multi-user uploads, and direct download links.

features.title: File Upload
features.description: Upload files for temporary sharing with automatic expiration after set time periods

features.title: Direct Download Links
features.description: Generate unique URLs for each upload that recipients can access directly

features.title: Password Protection
features.description: Optionally protect uploads with passwords for secure file sharing

features.title: Upload Tracking
features.description: Monitor active uploads with progress indicators and transfer statistics

features.title: No Registration Required
features.description: Share files without requiring sender or recipient accounts
